short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize negative reviews and analyze ingredients for beauty and skincare products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop Conscious AI summarizes negative reviews and ingredients for beauty and skincare products. It currently analyzes negative reviews for Ulta's website and there are more products and websites, along with key features being added.
